infos.value: You can work together and interact with other players while in a guild.
As there are many things that you will be able to do once you join a guild, I strongly suggest that you join one.
I recommend that you join a guild.

• Joining Guilds •
There are two ways to join a guild: you can either establish your own guild as the Guild Leader or join an established guild.
Proceed to a tutorial on Joining Guilds?
